|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 01/06/2010 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->

}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== 2.4/5GHz, Mini PCI, 802.11a/b/g/n, 315mW, 2x MMCX
There are two MMCX connectors on the board.
FRC Internet Products FCC ID of W93-ABCAU500N :OUI 00:0C:42
==Links of Interest== [http://mikrotik.ru/katalog/katalog/komplektujuschie/adaptery-i-karty/radio-karty/r52hn Catalog] :WLAN Power: 25dBm
